member.name: T:VinjEx.EventWrapper
member.summary: EventWrapper used for two-way communication. No need to use it manually.

member.name: T:VinjEx.Injectable
M:VinjEx.Injectable.IpcConnectClient(System.String)
member.summary:
Get interface object from host.
Fixed method from Easyhook for two-way communication.

members.member: In order to save resources, we make it sleep.

member.name: M:VinjEx.Injectable.Exit(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Stop the Inject DLL. Will call OnUnload after Exit

member.name: M:VinjEx.Injectable.OnLoad
member.summary: Call when the Inject DLL is loaded, before the target remuse.

member.name: M:VinjEx.Injectable.OnCommand(System.Object)
member.summary: Called when host send a command.

member.name: M:VinjEx.Injectable.OnUnload
member.summary: Called when the inject dll is going to exit. Will be called after Exit. Be careful if you call Exit manually.

member.name: E:VinjEx.InjectableProcess.OnClientResponse
member.summary: Register by host. Fired when client send response.

member.name: E:VinjEx.InjectableProcess.OnClientExit
member.summary: Register by host. Fired after client unload.

member.name: P:VinjEx.InjectableProcess.SleepInterval
member.summary: How much time(ms) dll thread will sleep once when idle. Will pass to dll thread when call . Would be useless after that.

member.name: M:VinjEx.InjectableProcess.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.param: how much time dll thread will sleep once when idle

member.name: M:VinjEx.InjectableProcess.Inject(System.String,System.String)
member.param: x64 DLL, if your target is 64bit program
